sentences.english: Now, suppose you are a pure-blooded wizard or witch who wants to do just that.
sentences.chinese: 現在假定你是一個想這樣做的巫師。

sentences.english: The magic of first-house land wizards is necessary to remove it.
sentences.chinese: 必須使用第一護院大地巫師的魔法方能清除。

sentences.english: This must be the dawn of wizard hipsters.
sentences.chinese: 這一定是巫師嬉皮士的黎明。

sentences.english: One of a wizard's most rudimentary skills is levitation or the ability to make objects fly.
sentences.chinese: 巫師最基本的技巧之一是飄浮，或者是讓物體飛起來。

sentences.english: Glenda needs Dorothy to kill the other witch and a wizard.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭達需要多蘿西殺死另一個女巫和一個巫師。

sentences.english: Ron also started teaching Harry wizard chess.
sentences.chinese: 羅恩還開始教哈利下巫師棋。

sentences.english: An Animagus is a wizard who elects to turn into an animal.
sentences.chinese: 化獸師是自己選擇變成動物的巫師。

sentences.english: But she won't accept that there was a sangoma in our family.
sentences.chinese: 但是她拒絕承認我們家中有巫師。

sentences.english: It would seem that Wizarding folk aren't injured as quickly by things like this.
sentences.chinese: 大概身爲巫師，這些尋常的事故不會造成傷害。

sentences.english: Shamans were the holy men of early human civilization.
sentences.chinese: 巫師是早期人類文明中的聖者。

sentences.english: Swear your fealty to the Wizard's Throne.
sentences.chinese: 請在巫師王座面前，宣誓你的忠誠。

sentences.english: An evil Opus Dei albino monk stalks the streets of Rome in the film, The Da Vinci Code.
sentences.chinese: 電影《達芬奇密碼》中有一名患有白化病的邪惡巫師。

sentences.english: The head of the International Confederation of Wizards is called the Supreme Mugwump .
sentences.chinese: 巫師國際聯邦的首腦被稱爲最高會長。

sentences.english: At the top left of centre he is seated and again tumescent with his hands on the ground in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 在中間靠左上方，老巫師程坐姿，手放在身前的地上。

sentences.english: Just uploaded a batch of pictures of halloween, Tristan is the almighty wizard! Got quite some sweets.
sentences.chinese: 今天又整理出一批鬼節的照片，小貝是小巫師，呵呵。

sentences.english: There was an evil sorcerer and a great battle, and my parents were saviors.
sentences.chinese: 那裏有一個邪惡的巫師和一場大戰，我父母是救世主。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
(of a spirit or deity) to possess sb
to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to deal the fatal blow (sports, chess etc)/to score the winning point
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
